name: Mincing Emitter (Smol)
customPrimary: This emitter's beam just doesn't understand boundaries or why nothing likes when it minces up to their hull for a hearty HELLO SAILOR before their shields let slip in some in%s damage to their poor poor engines and weapons emplacements.

name: Thot Cannon (Weak)
customPrimary: This cannon is the kind of cannon your commanding officer warns you about. Why? It is %s powered. Commissioned Officers might not understand but your MCPO might. Or ask at a bar... where you might meet someone who operates one of these.
